Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Dry the shirt.', '3. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve dirty(shirt)
        # Ensure the shirt is identified as dirty prior to washing
        wash(shirt)
        # Perform the washing operation on the shirt
        achieve clean(shirt)
        # Confirm the shirt is clean after washing

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select an instance categorized as a shirt
        wash_shirt(shirt)
        # Invoke the wash_shirt behavior to wash the shirt

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select a dirty shirt
        wash_shirt(shirt)
